# File Migration Map

## Core Files
- ARCHITECTURE_DNA.instructions.md → CORE/ARCHITECTURE_DNA.instructions.md
- GOD.instructions.md → CORE/GOD_MODE.instructions.md
- UNIFIED_DIVINE_AGRICULTURAL_PATTERNS.instructions.md → CORE/UNIFIED_PATTERNS.instructions.md

## Language Files
- QUANTUM_TYPESCRIPT.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/LANGUAGES/QUANTUM_TYPESCRIPT.instructions.md
- NEO_PYTHON.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/LANGUAGES/NEO_PYTHON.instructions.md
- TERRAFORM_ASCENDED.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/LANGUAGES/TERRAFORM_ASCENDED.instructions.md

## Technical Files
- PERFORMANCE_ALCHEMY.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/PERFORMANCE/CORE_ALCHEMY.instructions.md
- TEST_ASCENSION.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/TESTING/TEST_ASCENSION.instructions.md

## Agricultural Files
- AGRICULTURAL_DIVINITY.instructions.md → AGRICULTURAL/BASE_PATTERNS.instructions.md
- AGRICULTURAL_PERFORMANCE_ALCHEMY.instructions.md → AGRICULTURAL/PERFORMANCE_PATTERNS.instructions.md
- AGRICULTURAL_TEST_ASCENSION.instructions.md → AGRICULTURAL/TEST_PATTERNS.instructions.md

## Next.js Files
- NEXTJS_DIVINITY/COMPONENT_ARCHITECTURE.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/NEXTJS/COMPONENT_PATTERNS.instructions.md
- NEXTJS_DIVINITY/API_INTEGRATION.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/NEXTJS/API_PATTERNS.instructions.md
- NEXTJS_DIVINITY/STATE_MANAGEMENT.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/NEXTJS/STATE_PATTERNS.instructions.md

## Platform Files
- PLATFORM_DIVINITY/DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.instructions.md → CORE/DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.instructions.md
- PLATFORM_DIVINITY/PERFORMANCE_GUIDE.instructions.md → TECHNICAL/PERFORMANCE/OPTIMIZATION_GUIDE.instructions.md
- PLATFORM_DIVINITY/SECURITY_GUIDE.instructions.md → SECURITY/SECURITY_GUIDE.instructions.md

## Files to Remove (Redundant)
- */INFO.instructions.md (consolidate into main pattern files)
- OPTIMIZATION_ANALYSIS.instructions.md (merged into CORE_ALCHEMY.instructions.md)
- PLATFORM_DIVINITY/TASK_*.instructions.md (consolidate into single task management file)

## Migration Steps
1. Create all necessary directories
2. Move files to new locations
3. Update cross-references
4. Remove redundant files
5. Validate new structure
